title: 2013 Ford Explorer Eco Boost with Gibson Exhaust
description:
Part # 319693 Aluminized (Also Available in Stainless # 619693)
11-15 Ford Explorer 3.5L: 11-15 Ford Explorer 2.0L Eco Boost
10-12 Lincoln MKT

Add some style to your Explorer with a Gibson Exhaust System. Gibson Exhaust Systems are designed and Dyno tuned to get the most out of your vehicle. Hassle free, bolt-on installation with professional looking results. No welding required. Backed by a Lifetime Limited Warranty.

– 2.25-in. aluminized mandrel bent tubing.
– Gibson Muffler features a baffled & chambered design, no internal packing, powerful deep tone.
– 4in. Polished T304 Stainless Round Slash- Cut Intercooled Tip; Weld On.
– Exit Is Straight Out The Back.
– Includes all hardware and factory style hangers for easy bolt on installation.
– Lifetime Limited Warranty
tags: Gibson Performance Exhaust, Gibson Exhaust Systems, Ford Explorer, EcoBoost, Eco Boost, Linkoln MKT, aftermarket exhaust
